sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Shield, AlertCircle, CheckCircle, Plus, Calendar, CreditCard, FileText, } from "lucide-react"; import { formatCurrency, formatDate } from "../../utils/formatters"; const InsuranceTab = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState("policies"); const tabs = [ { id: "policies", label: "Policies" }, { id: "premiums", label: "Premiums" }, { id: "claims", label: "Claims" }, ]; const policies = [ { id: "POL001", name: "Health Shield Plus", type: "Health Insurance", provider: "HDFC ERGO", coverage: 1000000, premium: 12000, status: "Active", expiryDate: "2024-03-15", nextPremium: "2024-02-15", }, { id: "POL002", name: "Life Secure Term Plan", type: "Term Life Insurance", provider: "SBI Life", coverage: 5000000, premium: 15000, status: "Active", expiryDate: "2045-08-20", nextPremium: "2024-01-20", }, ]; const premiumsDue = [ { policyId: "POL002", name: "Life Secure Term Plan", amount: 15000, dueDate: "2024-01-20", status: "Due Soon", }, { policyId: "POL001", name: "Health Shield Plus", amount: 12000, dueDate: "2024-02-15", status: "Upcoming", }, ]; const claims = [ { id: "CLM001", policyId: "POL001", name: "Health Shield Plus", amount: 45000, claimAmount: 42000, status: "Approved", submittedDate: "2023-11-15", settledDate: "2023-11-25", }, ]; const renderContent = () => { switch (activeTab) { case "policies": return (

Active Policies

{policies.map((policy) => (
{policy.name}
{policy.provider}
{policy.type}
{policy.status}
Coverage
{formatCurrency(policy.coverage)}
Annual Premium
{formatCurrency(policy.premium)}
Expiry Date
{formatDate(policy.expiryDate)}
Next Premium
{formatDate(policy.nextPremium)}
))}

Insurance Categories

{["Term Life", "Health", "Motor", "Travel", "ULIP"].map( (category) => ( ), )}
); case "premiums": return (

Premium Due

{premiumsDue.map((premium) => (
{premium.name}
{premium.policyId}
{formatCurrency(premium.amount)}
{formatDate(premium.dueDate)}
))}
); case "claims": return (

Claim History

{claims.map((claim) => (
{claim.name}
Claim #{claim.id}
{claim.status}
Claim Amount
{formatCurrency(claim.amount)}
Settled Amount
{formatCurrency(claim.claimAmount)}
Submitted
{formatDate(claim.submittedDate)}
Settled
{formatDate(claim.settledDate)}
))}
); default: return null; } }; return (
{tabs.map((tab) => ( ))}
{renderContent()}
); }; export default InsuranceTab;
